item.title: Baboons try to shoot people â€“ means of preventing It
item.summary: When shot, baboons will often try and throw the arrow back at the hunter and kill him too. When hunters see a baboon pull out an arrow and hold it in a certain way they must tell it that it is a 'girl's arrow', which will shame the baboon.
item.comments: 1) p.5916v: this story was told to Dia!kwain by his father (Xaa-ttin), 2) p.5920v: a list of |xam vocabulary (words and sentences), 3) See also Baboons should not be spoken with, 4) This story is found in Book V-24
item.author: Dia!kwain (David Hoesar) (V)
